body_html:
Hey @F3PiX,

thanx for reporting 🙏

For "resetting" the database, or setting up the project from scratch, I usually do the following:

# drop the old dbs if there are any
dropdb <dev-db-name>
dropdb <test-db-name>

# set them up fresh including seed data:
bundle exec rails db:setup

But yeah, we'll need to come up with a solution for the old migrations as well...

For "resetting" the database, or setting up the project from scratch, I usually do the following:
# drop the old dbs if there are any

body:
Hey @F3PiX,

thanx for reporting 🙏 

For "resetting" the database, or setting up the project from scratch, I usually do the following:
```sh
# drop the old dbs if there are any
dropdb <dev-db-name>
dropdb <test-db-name>

# set them up fresh including seed data:
bundle exec rails db:setup
```

But yeah, we'll need to come up with a solution for the old migrations as well...
